about_the_game:
Aqua vitae – the water of life. This is how the Irish monks would call whisky in the olden days. Today it’s a huge international business, and thanks to Whisky Bottler, you’ll be able to learn its secrets. Find out everything about whisky and become the most renowned producer of this extraordinary liquor. Deliver the best specially selected alcohols. Search for unique old types of whisky, or make your money on young and cheap liquor. Discover and blend unusual aromas. Establish and develop your own distillery. Find your own way to succeed in the world of whisky.



The following challenges await you:
1. Create your own blended whisky – visit distilleries and choose the best barrels. Blend them together properly to obtain unique tastes and aromas.
2. Find a unique single malt whisky for your clients – find the best barrel, selected to suite your client’s taste.
3. Design bottles and labels – an exceptional whisky requires exceptional packaging. Select an appropriate bottle, design a label and create a unique whisky brand.



4. Extract the secrets of the barrels – purchase barrels at auctions, blend whisky, add finishing to the liquors in order to obtain the best aromas. Remember the Angels’ Share.
5. Plan marketing campaigns – create advertisements for the press, television and the internet. Advertise your products at events and whisky festivals.
6. Build your own distillery – invest your earnings in your own distillery. Purchase the necessary equipment, employ the most skilled specialists and start the production of your own whisky.



The game will be designed in cooperation with a renowned whisky bottler, so it will resemble real mechanisms functioning in the world of whisky. Find out if you can be successful in the world of luxurious liquors!

  • Processor: Intel core 2 duo 2.4GHz

short_description: Learn the magic of whisky. Discover the aromas in old barrels. Visit Scottish distilleries, get to know their secrets, and start your own in the future. Create your own exceptional whisky. Find out whether you can be successful on the luxurious liquor market. Become a whisky bottler!
